articles.author: Philip Georgiadis
articles.title: AmexGBT buys rival CWT for $570mn in bet on business travel - Financial Times
articles.description: Corporate travel booking business expects spending by larger companies to increase this year
articles.content:
American Express Global Business Travel has agreed a $570mn deal to buy rival CWT, in a bet on the continued recovery of business travel following the pandemic.

articles.author: Dayanne Sousa, Megan Durisin Albery
articles.title: Cocoa Tops $9,000 Mark for First Time on Global Supply Crunch - Bloomberg
articles.description: Cocoa extended its surge — gaining more than $700 per ton in a single day and surpassing $9,000 for the first time ever — as a supply crunch grips the market and chocolate makers grapple for beans.
articles.content:
